title: Muriel.or.The.Time.of.Return.1963.DVDRip.x264
description:
Helene (Delphine Seyrig), a widow, sells antiques from the apartment she shares with her stepson, Bernard. Bernard is haunted by his participation in the torture and murder of a young woman named Muriel while serving as a soldier in the war in Algeria. Helene is obsessed by the memory of a man she was in love with twenty-two years ago. When she meets him again, she finds out he is not at all the man she remembered. Meanwhile, Bernard keeps on watching again and again the Super 8 film of his Algerian experience. Alain ResnaisÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ third feature film, like Hiroshima mon amour and Last Year at Marienbad is a powerful meditation on memory and images. Images in the mind and images on film are the two forms of recollection the characters have to deal with. Muriel has also been one of the rare French films to deal with torture in Algeria, a taboo subject matter one year after the end of the war and Algerian independence. Screenplay and dialog were written by ResnaisÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ writer for Nuit et brouillard Jean Cayrol.
